references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced a novel diffusion model that significantly outperforms GANs in image synthesis, a fundamental technology leveraged in VideoAnydoor for high-fidelity video object insertion.

references.paper_title: Video generation models as world simulators
references.reason: This work presents a new approach to generating videos that uses diffusion models as world simulators, providing a foundational framework for VideoAnydoor's end-to-end video object insertion.
Anydoor, a zero-shot object-level image customization method, is directly used in VideoAnydoor to enable users to customize the appearance of the target object seamlessly.

references.paper_title: Revideo: Remake a video with motion and content control
references.reason: ReVideo, a state-of-the-art video editing method, is compared with VideoAnydoor in the paper, highlighting the advancements made by the proposed method in achieving superior performance.

references.paper_title: AnyV2V: A tuning-free framework for any video-to-video editing tasks
references.reason: AnyV2V, a tuning-free framework for video-to-video editing, is compared to VideoAnydoor in the paper, illustrating the improvements and novel approaches used in VideoAnydoor for precise motion control and content editing.
